subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Turner, who was known with the Mets as a plucky utility man, is now a key part of the Dodgers’ lineup. He entered Game 4 batting .500 through the first three games.
snippet: Turner, who was known with the Mets as a plucky utility man, is now a key part of the Dodgers’ lineup. He entered Game 4 batting .500 through the first three games.
